markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Vaultbreaker's Harness](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2307)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 145 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #158: Sixty Feet Under](/Sources.aspx?ID=47) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 230 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn backpack

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _vaultbreaker's harness_ has four pockets across the chest. The pockets contain a set of [infiltrator's thieves' tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58), infiltrator picks, a [levered crowbar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=18), and a [glass cutter](/Equipment.aspx?ID=870). These items are magically bound to the harness; if they are more than 1 foot away from you, they disappear, then reappear in the harness at the next sunset. [Broken](/Conditions.aspx?ID=2) or destroyed items similarly reappear, restored, in their proper pockets at sunset.

<document level="2" id="action-1855" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Vaultbreaker's Harness
